# Introduction to R

#### Andrew Borgman // VARI BBC


-----


## Background

The Bioinformatics & Biostatistics Core will present the inaugural Core Services Special Topics seminar at noon on Sept. 8 in conference rooms 2101 and 2102. The seminar is entitled *Introduction to R*. **Participants must bring a laptop with [R](http://www.r-project.org/) & [RStudio](http://www.rstudio.com/) installed (if you need help installing, please see a Bioinformatics & Biostatistics staff member)**.


-----


## Installing R & RStudio

* **Install R:** Here are links to downloads for the latest versions of `R` for [Windows](http://cran.r-project.org/bin/windows/base/) & [OS X](http://cran.r-project.org/bin/macosx/)
* **Installing RStudio:** Download and install the latest version of RStudio [here](http://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/)
